spot.title: Beech tree
spot.content: Fagus sylvatica, the European beech or common beech, is a deciduous tree belonging to the beech family Fagaceae. It is a large tree, capable of reaching heights of up to 50 m tall and 3 m trunk diameter.

spot.title: Oak tree
spot.content: An oak is a tree or shrub in the genus Quercus of the beech family, Fagaceae. There are approximately 600 extant species of oaks.

spot.title: Lime tree
spot.content: Tilia is a genus of about 30 species of trees native throughout most of the temperate Northern Hemisphere. Commonly called lime trees in the British Isles, they are not closely related to the lime fruit.
